document.full_text: financial markets regained some poise on tuesday but recouped only a little ground from the battering inflicted a day earlier by fears that the euro zone debt crisis is heading for a new, more dangerous phase.
document.title: european debt crisis fears keep markets on edge
lines_and_colors: financial markets regained some poise on tuesday but recouped only a little ground from the battering inflicted a day earlier by fears that the euro zone debt crisis is heading for a new, more dangerous phase.
